name: Mr. Fruit
description:
MOBILE FRIENDLY VERSION

https://mr-fruit.netlify.app/

INTRODUCTION

Mr. Jumper is a simple platformer where Mr. and Mrs. Fruit catch falling fruits.  Play this progressively speedy game and catch as many fruits as you can to improve your score. But look out for the bombs, they hurt!

HOW TO PLAY

Left Click with mouse and drag the player across the screen.

Right and left arrow keys can also be used to play.

FEEDBACK

This is my first game and all feedback is welcome. Please provide your opinion below.

More characters will be added in the future.

CREDITS

Soham Mayekar - For art and reviews.
